product_meta.title: Campanelli's Cooking Buddy Pot Holder - Professional Grade All-In-One Non-Slip Silicone Potholder, Hand Towel, Lid Grip, and Trivet - Heat Resistant up to 500ºF - As Seen On QVC (Forest Green)
product_meta.description: Color:Forest GreenToo hot to handle? Try cooking with a buddy. As seen on QVC, this innovative Campanelli Products kitchen tool accessory is designed to hang over your shoulder so it's always within easy reach. The Cooking Buddy has 100% fiber-reinforced silicone inserts which protect against temperatures up to 500ºF while providing extra grip to ensure pots, pans, and dishes don't slip. Use the soft outer terry material to clean and dry hands. While draped over the shoulder, the storage pouch can be used to hold cooking tools, recipe cards, or keep your mobile device close by but out of harms way. Plus, when you fold the Cooking Buddy, its heat resistance and soft material make it a great trivet for hot serving dishes. Machine washable and dryer safe.
feature_bullets: HEAT RESISTANT / NON-SLIP GRIPS: This revolutionary cooking tool is heat-resistant up to 500ºF and features non-slip grips for safe, easy handling. Improve your grip and control while handling hot cooking, baking, & grilling utensils, tools, dishes, pots, & pans.

ADVANCED HEAT & BURN PROTECTION: Featuring dual-hand pot holders, the 28" Cooking Buddy protects not only the hand and wrists but the body as well. When not in use, hang over the oven door handle or simply throw over your shoulder so that it's always within reach for grabbing hot items or being used as a prep towel.

VERSATILE, ALL-IN-ONE COOKING HELP: The Cooking Buddy is made from 100% premium terry cotton and functions as a prep towel, dual pot holder, tool caddy, lid gripper and trivet all-in-one. Rest hot pans directly on the Cooking Buddy to protect countertops and easily open jars and bottles using the max-grip silicone inserts.
MACHINE WASHABLE & DRYER SAFE: This terry cloth towel is machine washable. To dry, simply toss the Cooking Buddy in the dryer or air dry.
AS SEEN ON QVC: Developed by home chef and Shopping Channel Guest, Chris Campanelli, this cooking solution has been featured on QVC and television.
